sizing.description: Optimized spinner size suitable for both 1) smaller components like Card and 2) full-page displays, ensuring it is neither too small nor too large.

active.description: Color indicating the active part of the loading.

inactive.description: Color indicating the inactive part of the loading.

border-radius.description: Radius SM applied to give the spinner a more organic appearance.

border-width.description: The spinner border is thick enough to stand out against the busy visual environment surrounding it.

blur.description: Background blur on the parent element behind the spinner. Has to be validated.
